P

Parameters - Annotation Type in com.agwego.fuzz.annotations
Specify the @Parameters to be used by @RunWith( FuzzTester.class )
The parameters are: TestDirectory (required) - the directory containing your test files (can be absolute or relative) Prefix - the file prefix to associate with the unit test Suffix - the file suffix to associate with the unit test, default ".json" TestDirectoryRootPropertyName - a property name to use instead of TestDirectory (not implemented yet)
ParametersError - Exception in com.agwego.fuzz.exception
FuzzTestRunner, Parameters specific errors
ParametersError(String) - Constructor for exception com.agwego.fuzz.exception.ParametersError

V

validatePublicVoidNoArgMethods(Class<? extends Annotation>, boolean, List<Throwable>) - Method in class com.agwego.fuzz.FuzzTestRunner
Adds to errors if any method in this class is annotated with annotation, but: is not public, or takes parameters, or returns something other than void, or is static (given isStatic is false), or is not static (given isStatic is true).
